summary:
Competence summary
- Experienced Operations Manager in high volume and capital intensive chemical proces industry. Focus on manufacturing, also experienced in maintenance, engineering, project management and logistics.
- Strong analytical skills, works systematic and goal oriented, serious and direct approach, stress resistant.
- Started and implemented several (cost) optimization projects successfully by using lean techniques and continuous improvement.
- Started and implemented several organization changes (restructuring and down sizing), multiskilled operators and people development plans. 
- Knowledgeable of ISO 9001, 14001, 50001, OHSAS 18001 and ISEGA (Food & Toy Safety) procedures.
- MBTI profile; ISTP
- Languages: fluent in Dutch and English, moderate in German.
